2 dryers of 16 kg.
Program of 30, 45 or 60 degrees.
there is a change machine for bills of 5, 10 or 20 euros
machines only accept 1 euro coins

description:
Large car park near the city center.
Possibility to sleep, without problem, but surrounded by buildings and at the entrance of the city.
No service, ideal for visiting the city.

title: (33316) Villaviciosa - 4 AS-330
description: Called Carda, site overlooking the river, with little traffic, very quiet a few minutes from Villaviciosa.

title: (33316) Villaviciosa - 2 Casa Espuncia
description: Place to spend only the day and do the guided tour of the El Gaitero cider factory, with good parking, very quiet

title: (33315) Villaviciosa - 60A Calle Riaño
description: Gas station with the possibility of shopping.

title: (33315) Villaviciosa - 29 Lugar Puntal
description: Picnic area with 7 wooden tables and trees. Located a few meters above the road between Villaviciosa and Tazones, just in front of the beach. Access to the beach at 15 meters, very quiet and pleasant area. There are no services, but also no indication of an overnight ban. Views and highly recommended stopping place.

title: (33310) Asturias - AS-255
description: Ample parking next to the church. Very quiet to spend the night. Next to it is the River Path of the Viacaba River.

title: (33316) Villaviciosa - 22 Barrio Misiego
description: Quiet parking at the good side of the river. No traffic. There is a little beach to wander, next to a bird watching site. Grassy, flat surface.

title: (33315) Samartin del Mar - 15 Lugar Puntal
description: It is a magnificent eucalyptus forest 30 meters high with the possibility of parking below with a motorhome. The forest is located in front of the port which is very small and very calm. One of the best

title: (33315) Asturias - 2 Lugar Puntal
description: Picnic area in a quiet area next to the estuary on the edge of the eucalyptus forest. It is reached by the port road. There is a small beach, a bar in the apartment building opposite and a restaurant in the port.

title: (33316) Liñero - 1D Calle Camping la Ensenada
description: It is a simple car park, on the other side of Rodiles beach, without services, and only for vans and cars. The police apparently go by regularly but the vans are allowed as long as one does not stretch too much. View of the ria and far away the magnificent peaks of Europe, small beach by the river, a very nice place to spend the night. A few restaurants next door

name: Camping Fin de Siglo
title: (33316) Camping Fin de Siglo
description: MAXIMUM 6 meters. Small and quiet campsite, facing the sea. Possibility of plots facing the sea and inside the campsite, with simple but well-kept and very clean facilities. It has an area for overnight stays that is in the parking area.

title: (33316) Liñero - VV-6
description: The plage of Rodiles. Overnight controlled in high season, in low season with hardly any problems. Do not unfold or remove chairs.

title: (33316) Liñero - 73 Lugar Rodiles
description: Ample parking behind the Camping, we were only there during the day

title: (33313) Tresvilla -
description: Very quiet recreational area at the top of the hill with many tables and barbecues. Space at the beginning to park with a slight incline, but later, space for two motorhomes on the flat, already on the ground. Very acceptable road access.

title: (33316) Villaviciosa - 47 Lugar Rodiles
description: Parking next to eucalyptus and beach. Calm and quiet night by the sea. Next door is a bar.

title: (33326) Villaviciosa - VV-13
description: El Lluexe recreational area, near Piedrafita, 10 km from Villaviciosa. Very quiet picnic area with views of the Sueve and the Villaviciosa estuary. Flat parking on grass. No services. Narrow and winding road in good condition from Villaviciosa or Colunga.

title: (33316) Villaviciosa - VV-6
description: if all the places are occupied, on the right there is a parking 109 but without sea view!

title: (33316) - 51 Lugar Barcena
description: A nice place to stop and have a picnic by the river stream. There is only one spot to park and not very flat but we've left a big stone there for others. Ideal for one night stay. We suggest you to visit a very special and unique bistro nearby ¡Que Cocine Valentina!.

title: (33315) San Miguel - 22 Aldea San Miguel
description: Parking to visit Tazones. I do not know if we can spend the night. Beautiful village

title: (33316) Villaviciosa -
description: ACs Playa de Rodiles car park. It is about 500 meters from the beach, next to the water treatment plant. There is enough space for about 50 ACs, but the treatment plant makes a lot of noise at night and many of the squares are not level.

title: (33312) Villaviciosa - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at a time of the most beautiful and little known Asturian pre-Romanesque in Asturias. Bar in front with a very pleasant duel that tells you the history of the complex, good routes in the surroundings for cycling and walking. quiet place, without any problem to spend the night. 100% recommended.

title: (33310) Viñón - 29 Lugar Arboleya
description: Carmen de Arboleya Sanctuary. Play area to stop and rest. Not a sound, just the cow bells. I don't think there is a problem sleeping.

name: Camping Villaviciosa Asturias
title: (33316) Camping Villaviciosa Asturias
description: Camping Villaviciosa, space for motorhomes with all services (emptying and filling water, chemical toilet, laundry and washing machine). In the center of Asturias, strategic place to know the region.

title: (33312) Villaviciosa - 3 Caserio Santi
description: Field along a small road, next to a wash house with drinking water, on the way to Saint Jacques. Room for one or two van, narrow access road. No passage during the night.

title: (33529) - CB-7
description: Fuente de agua potable natural de montaña

title: (33314) - 2 Aldea Bustiello
description: Small beach without telephone coverage. It is reached by a road in good condition with many turns and steep slopes. The beach is small and with parking that is virtually empty at night. It is a nice place to spend the night without noise or discomfort. The beach is mainly of stone floor.

title: (33310) Fresnéu - v
description: Public parking in the middle of nature. level squares.

title: (33314) Villaviciosa - 70 VV-2
description: This place is a public park near the beach Playa de Espana, surrounded by nature and a small river. There's also a nice restaurant/caffe by the beach. Wonderful place to stay by day or night.

name: Camping Playa Spain
title: (33314) Camping Playa Spain
description: Villaviciosa, 141 VV-3. Camping Playa Spain

title: (33314) Villaviciosa - 1 Camping Playa España
description: Paid parking. Large grassy parking lot with direct access to picnic area and beach. No overnight stay.

title: (33324) Colunga - 5A Caserio Palacio
description: They have showers for 3 euros at the gas station. It is not the cleanest but they get you out of a tight spot.

title: (33328) Luces - 2A Caserio la Rasa
description: Water point with good flow before arriving at Lastre lighthouse.

name: Llagar Castañón
title: (33314) Llagar Castañón
description: Asturian cider press. They have an area for loading and unloading water. They do guided tours of natural cider production. There is a store of Asturian products. It's called the Castañón cider mill and be careful with the timetable. They open from 9:30 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. and from 3:30 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. Saturdays from 10:30 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. Outside of these hours it is not accessible and the turn to return is not comfortable, if not reverse.

title: (33324) - 4A Caserio Palacio
description: Cepsa Fuel station. Showers and toilets. Restaurant. If you just moving and want to shower and rest this is good spot. for west bound traffic. im not sure if its accessible from motorway going in the other direction

title: (33328) Luces -
description: Very quiet area with very nice views of the famous Faro de Lastres and the coast, 3 vans fit, we slept great.

title: (33325) Colunga - Unnamed Road
description: With the best views

title: (33518) Asturias -
description: Very quiet place in a rural environment, ideal to  make a stop for lunch. It is a recreational area with tables, benches, barbecues, drinking water and garbage cans. It has about 12 parking spaces for cars (with a slight slope). You can explore the surroundings both on foot and by bicycle, a visit to the church of Santiago (of pre-Romanesque origin) is recommended.

title: (33328) Colunga - Unnamed road
description: Free, only daytime MUJA parking. Open from 10am to 10pm

title: (33320) Colunga - 7 Avenida Sueve
description: Parking near the center of Colunga. There is a water tap.

title: (33518) La Vega - Calle Dr. Rimada
description: Drinking water fountain in the town square. Nearby parking, bars, bank, supermarket and near the municipal swimming pool.

title: (33518) La Vega - 96 Camín del Campu Fútbol
title_short: (33518) La Vega - 96 Camín del Campu Fútbol
description:
Car park with gravel floor next to the sports center, wide and fairly level, with unmarked spaces.
Nearby there are bars, supermarket, doctor, pharmacy, bank, water fountain and swimming pools.

title: (33320) Colunga - 32 Aldea Poladura
description: Small space next to the road with space for 1 motorhome. It is 1.5 km from La Griega beach, where it is impossible to park without paying

title: (33330) Lastres -
description: Public lawn parking with permission to park and stay overnight. very quiet and plenty of space to play with children and eat quietly. green area.

title: (33330) Colunga - 44 Carretera de Lastres
description: Private and guarded paid parking in high season. It is a luxury to find such an area in Asturias and rest without fear of the GC coming, since they do not see us very well in the principality. Perfect to visit the town of llastres. Car 5 euros, camper and AC of more than 5 meters 10 euros. We have not paid anything, I suppose it will be paid in the summer. But that fee is worth it just for the views and the sunset. No services. Totally level. If it was closed at the beginning of the town there is another car park but it is worth trying here.

name: Camping Costa Verde
title: (33328) Camping Costa Verde
description: Colunga, 34 Caserio Vista Alegre. Camping Costa Verde beach The Greek. Very clean and calm. Some plots facing the road is the only drawback. otherwise good service and very good environment. The beach of the river, and a route to see dinosaur footprints.

title: (33529) Nava - AS-333
description:
Picnic area 4 mins outside of Nava with stream, picnic benches, fire and BBQ pits and swing.
2 parking areas, 1 either end of picnic area, reasonably flat.
Used by locals. some road noise.

title: (33328) Colunga - 52 Avenida Asturias
description: Service station with water and toilets.

title: (33328) San Telmo - 22 Caserio la Rasa
description: Great place to park on the waterfront. In January it was completely empty, but none of the restaurants were open. Great place to go see the dinosaur tracks 600m away. Signs indicating that there was no night for caravans.

title: (33328) San Telmo - 20 Caserio la Rasa
description: Parking with public toilets

title: (33350) Gijón - Camino de Santa Olaya
description: Very large esplanade where you can spend the night or spend the day without any problem next to the observatory. Perfect for routes. There are tables and fountain with drinking water.

title: (33391) Gijón - 9 Barrio S Pelayo
description:
Place with beautiful view (Gion and surroundings area).
Next to the small road almost without traffic (during night 0 cars).
Sometimes you can see cyclists or people walking with dog, but everyone says HOLA to you.

name: Camping Deva Gijon
title: (33394) Camping Deva Gijon
description: Gijón, 78 Camin of the Pasadiella. Camping "Deva Gijón"

title: (33391) Santurio -
description:
Large Picnic area with views down to Gijon and around. A very busy place at the weekend but nobody at night so sleeping is peaceful. This place is not recomended for anything larger than a small van as the road up is really steep and narrow, we just about made it in our two tonne van, but in first gear! For 4x4 and cars no problem.
Even though there are bins, there is still tissue on the floor as there is no toilet here, but it's not that bad, we've seen worse!

title: (33539) Piloña -
description: Recreational area "Monte Cayón" Picnic area equipped with tables and benches, swings, water and garbage cans. ONLY SUITABLE FOR CAMPERS. It is accessed from the town of Biedes, a very narrow concrete road, with a steep slope and sharp curves, the last 100m unpaved. Very quiet place to spend the night, with beautiful views of the surroundings, 16 parking spaces, on a slope, but you can park in the surroundings.

title: (33342) Coceña - AS-260
description: Water point with self-service tap

title: (33314) Villaviciosa - 6 Lugar Peñucal
description: Public parking with three levels. Spacious, easy to maneuver, accessible. To go down to the beach you have to do a piece by road. There is a garbage container at the entrance. No services.

title: (33394) Gijón - Camín de Santamariña
description: Small picnic area with a natural spring. a single table and parking space for a couple of cars.

title: (33314) Villaviciosa - 3 Lugar Peñucal
description: Parking on the beach of the Ñora. In summer you must arrive no later than 10.30. since it is filled very soon with cars. there is no height limit. Enter only 2 AC's plus 5 meters. The rest will have to park in battery. Beautiful views of the beach. Very quiet place with restaurant. It does not have services. Up there is another large parking lot where about 100 cars enter.

title: (33529) Nava - 3 Camino Santa Olaya
description: Parking without services that allows the parking of motorhomes. Perfect to know the town and highly recommended to see the end of stage of the Vuelta de España

title: (33520) Nava - 1 Calle la Vega
description: Coin laundry eco laundry

title: (33203) Gijón - 47 Travesia Alisos
description: It usually has people but the views are spectacular!

title: (33203) Asturias - Cam de la Nora
description:
La Ñora beach car park.
no services. totally flat.
Suitable for large motorhomes.
There are picnic tables and dumpster. Surrounded by tall trees and lots of green.
A 5-minute walk from the beach, with a cobbled path in very good condition, but a lot of unevenness.

title: (33538) Infiesto - 3 Lugar el Llanu
description: Quiet area next to the sanctuary of the Virgen de la Cueva, with a swimming pool and an area with tables and gardens. Very nice walk to the river.

title: (33580) Sorrobín - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place to spend the night, there is a tap with drinking water, tables and trash cans.

title: (33203) - 1114 Camino de La Playa de Estaño
title_short: (33203)  - 1114 Camino de La Playa de Estaño
description: Beach parking day and night with capacity for about 20 vehicles. In summer if it's good it fills up, but at night there's room. No phone coverage. Drinking water and garbage containers. Beach not suitable for pets.

address.street: 1114 Camino de La Playa de Estaño

title: (33529) Nava - 7 Caserio Gamoneu
description: Stop-over and overnight parking for home vehicles enabled by the Nava City Council. This new space, located just 800 meters from the center of the town, doubles the places of the previous one and will allow us to know and enjoy, in addition to the hotel industry and local commerce, everything that the naveto council offers us, which is not little.

title: (33203) Cimadevilla - 261 Calle Luis Moya Blanco
description: University parking lot parking possible during school holidays. nearby bus

title: (33394) Gijón -
description: La Laboral-City of Culture car park. I don't know if it will be possible to spend the night but to come to visit it is great, very beautiful and you get there well. Plenty of parking.

title: (33518) Collado - Siero - 6027A Lugar Castro
description: Quiet place to dine and spend the night, great views, no noise. Respect the facilities. Garbage container in the adjoining parking lot for 5 or 6 vans or 2 motorhomes.

title: (33530) Infiesto - 3 Plaza la Benéfica
description: Infiesto area is new since March 25, 2017

title: (33203) Gijón - 14 Camino del Túnel

title: (33341) La Isla - 9 Carretera CN-632 Ribadesella
description: Parking spot near the road with ample space for motorhomes, at walking distance to Playa de la Isla

title: (33530) Infiesto - 13 Calle San Miguel
description: New automatic laundry at 300m, next to a large food ..

title: (33204) Gijón - 5 Camino Hermanos Canal Granda
description: Ample parking, very quiet, well lit with views of the Labor University of Gijón and surrounded by green areas. It is very well connected to visit the city by bus, taking the L1 that leaves you in the center. You also have a Mercadona 10 minutes walk away.

title: (33203) Gijón - 19 Camino de la Pipa
description: Picnic tables and drinking water. Space to park about 10 van, it does not seem to fill up easily, it is a quiet and residential area.

title: (33539) Asturias - 15 Avenida Pialla
description: Municipal sports center with access to showers with hot water

title: (33203) Gijón - 390 Camino Monteserín
description: Slightly sloping parking on the cliffs with access to a beach. There are tables, trash cans and water. The road is narrow and at the driveway branches protrude to the street

title: (33529) Nava - 69 Lugar Piloñeta
description: Nice and quiet place at the foot of Les Praeres, a mountain pass. Large area with level parts and all surrounded by green. Attached to the river and without night traffic

title: (33203) Gijón - 8 Camino Cipreses
description: Parking for 4 cars, wastebasket tables and a fountain

title: (33583) Villamayor - 77 Barrio Nuevo
description: Perfect parking to do the Chorrón route. Wide and fairly level. Next to a restaurant and with a small park for children.

title: (33203) - 93 Camino de Serín
description: Parking of a church surrounded by houses, we had a very quiet night, we went to the parking next door but there were bottles, and couples, and we decided to sleep here alone since we came in January. Without services.

title: (33204) Asturias - 7A Avenida de Albert Einstein
description: Huge parking lot to spend the night. Very spacious and no stops or parking restrictions. To visit the city you have about 10-15min by bike.

title: (33203) Gijón - 9 Camino de la Fuente
description: Beautiful parking with a magnificent view of Gijon. Small sites, There are public toilets

title: (33343) Caravia - 1 Lugar Caravia Baja
description: They are setting up a parking lot, surely paid, to expand places for August ¿? Flat field with grassy ground next to the national road.

title: (33343) - 3 Lugar Caravia Baja
description: A place surrounded by fields just a step away from the beach and with views of the cliffs. On the North Road. 3-5 vans. There is water to drink!

title: (33344) Caravia - N-632
description: Parking free for the winter.

title: (33343) Caravia - 1 Lugar Caravia Baja
description: Field transformed into parking lot. We spent a quiet night, no one around us. Only point of vigilance: we found ticks on us!! Don't go barefoot! There is a "3€" sign but no one to charge us...

title: (33203) Gijón - Camin de Peñarrubia
description: Parking indicated to reach the penurubbia beach car park. In peace, nobody from 20:00. No water, no toilet. The beach is accessible by stairs down the path.

title: (33343) Caravia Baja - 6 Lugar Caravia Baja
description: Public bathrooms, a fountain with drinking water (the taps come out of the stones in the grassy area) and beach showers.

title: (33203) Gijón - sn Paseo Doctor Fleming
description: Parking place, Gijón Sports Palace. You can NOT park on Sunday from 00:00

title: (33204) Gijón - 302A Barrio Castiello Urbano
description: A Great calm and surveiled park near the sports center Las Mestas, much quieter for overnight than other parks I saw in Gijon, although to visit the city it is a little bit far from the center. In August with the city parks all full, this was perfect!

title: (33203) Gijón - Avenida Torcuato Fernández Miranda
description: El Molinon football stadium parking lot. Quiet site where you can spend the night.

title: (33350) La Camocha - 791 Carretera Lavandera Vega
description: Clean and modern self-service laundry. Parking opposite at 8:00. Cafes next door.

title: (33548) - 59B Aldea Cofiño
description: We found this place to spend the night, we came to visit family living in Cofiño. The road is not bad, only a bit tight on the portion that separates the village from AS-269. This, with the AC getting here is very easy to access. If the weather is good, you have a spectacular view of the Picos de Europa under a starry night or for the sunrise. There is a 100 meter source of drinking water.

title: (33203) Gijón - 11A Paseo Doctor Fleming
description: Parking near the center and the beach

title: (33203) Gijón - 7 Parque de Isabel la Católica
title_short: (33203) Gijón - 7 Parque de Isabel la Católica
description:
Public toilets and drinking water fountain.
With opening and closing hours (see photo)

title: (33203) Asturias - s/n Camino los Arces
description: Nice place with a sea view. Super quiet and only about 15 minutes walk to Gijon. Access to the beach over rocks.

title: (33203) Gijón - 3 Camino Mimosas
description: Common parking, overlooking the Bay of San LorenzoZona residential and calm. WC and large green areas. The summer from 9:30 to 10: 00 passes a Baker with fresh bread and pastries heco

title: (33203) Gijón - Unnamed road
description:
Free parking area big enough for CC 
we spent a night there with no problem at all. there was 2 other motor home and vans on the parking
by a big road so not a great place to cook and a bit noisy but really close to the city center

title: (33203) Gijón - 7A Camino de las Higueras
description: Battery parking, residential street very close to the annual dog beach, entrance 24. 40' from the old town on foot along the promenade. Very good area

title: (33203) Gijón - 140 Camino de Los Olmos
description: The charity car park, is monitored from 8:00 to 22:00. It is shared with cars. He does not have a service. 2 'from the beach of San Lorenzo.

name: Camping Gijón Costa Surf - EL Rinconín, Gijón, Asturias
title: (33203) Camping Gijón Costa Surf - EL Rinconín, Gijón, Asturias
title_short: (33203) Camping Gijón Costa Surf - EL Rinconín, Gijón, Asturias
description: I was allowed to spend the night there on 04/09/22 although the place was actually still closed. The washrooms are in the process of being renovated and weren't ready yet, but the showers worked and looked newly renovated too. For me for an overnight stay everything was ok, had a warm shower in the morning and it was absolutely quiet at night, although the place is right next to Gijon, where you also look directly.

title: (33350) - 725 Camiño Picu'l Sol
description: Flat gravel parking to climb to the peak of the sun. Quiet area with great views and picnic tables. Access through the village not suitable for very large AC

title: (33203) Gijón - 1D Avenida de José García Bernardo
title_short: (33203) Gijón - 1D Avenida de José García Bernardo
description: Good place to spend the night in a motorhome.

title: (33583) Villamayor -
description: Fully secluded picnic spot next to the El Corón de Villamayor waterfall. 2kms dirt and cement track to get there. Ideal for Furgo. The track is narrow with several sidings where you can park for day and night. With a mobile snack bar in August and September from noon to sunset. Very quiet at night without mosquitoes

title: (33203) Gijón - 8 Calle Marqués de Urquijo
description: Ecolaundry Self-Service Laundry

title: (33391) - 130 Camín del Carbayu
description: A great place to do a paradox and eat luxury in the Carbayu, spectacular portions and quality, then a good woodland with plenty of shade to rest from the feast

title: (33203) Gijón - 190 Avenida de José García Bernardo
title_short: (33203) Gijón - 190 Avenida de José García Bernardo
description: Free parking by the sea, perfect for a van the size of a camper, no signage for more than could stay, lively bar close by. The wall of the boulevard is suitable for some impromptu bouldering session!

title: (33344) Caravia - AS-260
description: On the road to the mirador of the fito (ocean side). To your left, an old quarry with a small house abandoned in the center. Offering breathtaking views of the coast from lastres to ribadesella. quiet places, very little passage at night. rocked by the sound of the bells of cows. "respect this place"

title: (33344) Caravia - 19 Plaza Industrial Carrales
description: They have gas bottles, lights, beach chairs, cables, tools... a village hardware store with very friendly staff.

title: (33529) Nava - Unnamed Road
description:
Cows, horses and views and peace.
 Steep driveway with no real off-road challenge.  Up there, you can drive but through the mountains.

title: (33202) Gijón - 19 Calle Aguado
description: Waterproof launderette, clean spacious and  modern. 2kg wash, detergent included, 15 minute dry. Use coins, change machine available, vending machine and free WiFi.. exce llent

title: (33584) Sevares - 400 Lugar Sebares
description: Nice place to spend the night with the river in the background

title: (33343) Caravia - 1B Caserio Valle
description: Water point

title: (33209) Gijón - 25 Camino Cementerio
description: Parking of the football stadium of los pericones or the cemetery just above. No problem to sleep on August 15, located in a large dog park 15 minutes walk from the city center. water points in the park and very clean toilets open during the day. Very quiet at night, there is even a shower (type beach shower) in the middle of the Park. Laundry in 5 minutes in Calle Ramon y Cajal.

title: (33209) Gijón - 6A Barrio Suco Urbano
description: Parking Ceares Cemetery. Very calm. Ideal to spend the night without noise. Far to walk to the center. Next to a well-kept park.

title: (33202) Gijón - 14 Calle Premio Real
description: Laundry area with 6 large capacity washers and 4 clothes dryers.

title: (33549) Caravia - AS-260
description: Good source of mountain drinking water on a bend 1km from Mirador del Fitu towards Arriondas. 2 small places to park the time to fill bottles and cans. A simple hose, no tap.

title: (33211) Gijón - 42A Camin de las Casas
description: Quiet parking, next to some houses. About 5 parking spots, there are always a few vans parked.

title: (33344) Caravia - AS-260
description: Mirador del Fitu Parking

title: (33390) Gijón - 946 Avenida Roces
description: Laundry go! Laundry

title: (33344) Caravia - 30A Lugar Prado
description: Asphalt parking. Right behind the information booth. Very flat.

title: (33344) Caravia - AS-260
description: El Fitu leisure area. Views of the Picos de Europa and the sea. Quiet with tables for dining. Category 1 ° C port. Keep clean

title: (33548) - 16B Lugar Vita
description: Perfect place to spend a night. Very quiet. No WC, no Water, no Garbage. Very Nice views, and nobody  go the night.

title: (33548) Hueges - 53D Lugar Hueges
description: Small grassy esplanade next to a bridge and a stream ideal for a quiet night for one or two vans. Attention difficult exit for big guys...

title: (33584) - 33 Lugar Villar de Guergu
description: Go to La Roca Restaurant / Grill (Sevares), ask for Ruben and tell him that you are a Motorhomeist who is recommended by an Asturian Companion. All house food of the highest quality, from scallops to a quality cachopo, from a Pot to a good Fabada, ribeye meats and roasts as few places you can eat (all grilled in oak wood), house desserts, frixuelos, rice pudding, a selection of Asturian cheeses, a scandal Gintonic, terraces, Chillout, children's area for kids, paddle tennis court, children's pool, picnic area by the River, it has free toilets and showers (If you consume) and it lets you stay sleep in your video guarded parking lot. It is a LUXURY .. !! In short, it is proposed to enable a Private Area. It will be one of the best since the environment, facilities and attention are unmatched ...

name: Camping Arenal de Moris
title: (33344) Camping Arenal de Moris

title: (33208) Gijón - 18D Calle Espronceda
description: It doesn't say that tourism or ac prohibited, but there is a height restriction on a sign but no barrier. You can therefore enter without any problem. The side spaces overlook a lawn so that you can park properly. 10 minutes walk from the center. We slept with no problems. No services. Very central

title: (33343) Caravia - Unnamed Road

title: () Caravia - Unnamed Road

title: (33343) Caravia - Unnamed Road

Pretty narrow gravel road which can be partly steep and muddy by certain weather conditions. Good ground clearance is required, 4x4 probably as well. However, we reached the place with a 4x4 Camper van and good ground clearance. A short hike up to the peak just next to the place is strongly recommended!

There is the main parking lot, another behind it and further on a huge open space, like half a football field (to enter you have to go through a narrow space). The only bad thing is: there is a soccer field with lights, a nearby road can be heard and there are no services.

LA CALZADA MUNICIPAL SPORTS COMPLEX
Access to the gym and changing rooms (with bathrooms and hot showers and hair dryers).

title: (33546) Viabaño - 63D Lugar Arobes

Little traffic in the afternoon and almost none at night. Very quiet and recommended place. Collect all the garbage that we produce so as not to leave a trace and to continue enjoying these hidden corners. Have a good trip
